[Java] Class GrailsConsoleAppender

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
      org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.log4j.appenders.GrailsConsoleAppender

public class GrailsConsoleAppender
extends org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton

A Log4j appender that appends to the GrailsConsole instance. Not for use in production/WAR deployed scenarios!

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
2.0
